unnormalised: Arre bhai, aiklay tem navin case, "Sharma Electronics vs. Gupta Innovations" news-acher. Dista Sharma Electronics-an Gupta Innovations-achem patent copy kel'lam kiteak tori solar panel tech-akhatir. Gupta Innovations infringement mhunn sangta, Rs. 50 lakh zaribhara magta! Tanche Adv. mhunta ki hem ekdum sode case Patents Act, 1970 hachea khal. Asha asa Gupta jikta, intellectual property rakunk zai, zanna assa?
normalised: Arre bhai, aiklay mhunn te naven case, "Sharma Electronics versus Gupta Innovations" khobramni. Distaa Sharma Electronics-an Gupta Innovations-ache patent kopikarun ghetle kiteakoi solar panel tech-akhatir. Gupta Innovations hakk sangta ki atikraman zala mhunn, magtaa rupya pachas lakh nuksan bhortuk! Tancho Advocate sangta ki ekdom spasht case asa Patents Act khal, ek hajar nov shembor satur. Aasha asa Gupta jikta, intellectual property sambhallunk zai, tuka khobor asa?
text: Arre bhai, aiklay tem navin case, "Sharma Electronics vs. Gupta Innovations" news-acher. Dista Sharma Electronics-an Gupta Innovations-achem patent copy kel'lam kiteak tori solar panel tech-akhatir. Gupta Innovations infringement mhunn sangta, Rs. 50 lakh zaribhara magta! Tanche Adv. mhunta ki hem ekdum sode case Patents Act, 1970 hachea khal. Asha asa Gupta jikta, intellectual property rakunk zai, zanna assa?
